name: Countering Financial Surveillance

cards.description: How governments and corporations track financial transactions.

Why cash transactions are increasingly restricted in financial warfare strategies.

cards.description: Methods to secure financial activity against monitoring.
bulletpoints: Mixing and obfuscation techniques to hide financial trails.
Offshore banking and alternative asset protection strategies.

cards.title: Escaping Financial Censorship and Asset Seizures
cards.description: Ensuring financial freedom against state or institutional control mechanisms.

Creating emergency financial escape plans in case of economic crackdown.
cards.summaryText: Disperse holdings, leverage protective legal gaps, and script crackdown-ready escape plans.
